entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
